sourcesContent: import { Box, ImageList,ImageListItem } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import image1 from '../../img/desktop-cat-bolsos.webp' import image2 from '../../img/desktop-cat-carteras.webp' import image3 from '../../img/desktop-cat-viajes.webp' import image4 from '../../img/desktop-cat-hombre.webp' const BannerCateg = ({responsive}) => { return ( // con flex que tenga condicional de 50% si es mediano, pequeño, de 25% si es grande ) } export default BannerCateg
